title: Encore: One Speckled Hen
dc:creator: WBUR
description: This week, we bring back a favorite story from the archives: Tony Award winner André De Shields (Hadestown, The Full Monty) stars in a Jewish tale that tests the old adage, "Finders keepers, losers weepers."
itunes:author: WBUR
